nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.utils

Class AccountHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.utils.AccountHelper

  • public class AccountHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for accounts
    WARN: Be aware that this helper doesn't access the services through the security layer. They are all local services.
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultAccount

        public MemberAccount getDefaultAccount()
        Returns the default account for the current member, but only if there is a logged member. Throws EntityNotFoundException otherwise, or if the member has no accounts

      • toVO

        public AccountHistoryTransferVO toVO(AccountOwner viewingOwner,
                            Transfer transfer,
                            java.util.Collection<PaymentCustomField> customFields,
                            java.util.Collection<MemberCustomField> fromCustomFields,
                            java.util.Collection<MemberCustomField> toCustomFields)
        Transforms the given transfer to a VO, according to the member viewing it
        Parameters:
        fromCustomFields - collection of fields to be set to the transfer's payer MemberVO.
        toCustomFields - collection of fields to be set to the transfer's receiver MemberVO.
